00016   /*
00017    * Reads the scenario definitions files and returns the scenario
00018    */
00019   Scenario* ArtemisScenarioReader::readScenario(){
00020     Scenario* sc = new Scenario();
00021     readIntersections(sc);
00022     readLinks(sc);
00023     readDetectors(sc);
00024     readPhases(sc);
00025     readSignalGroups(sc);
00026     return sc;
00027   }

00029   /*
00030    * Reads the intersection definitions file and places into the scenario object.
00031    * @param scenario object where intersections data will be placed
00032    */  
00033   void ArtemisScenarioReader::readIntersections(Scenario* sc){
00034 
00035     // File with signaled intersections
00036     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/Signals.txt").c_str());
00037 
00038     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00039     string line;
00040     getline(fin,line);
00041     vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00042     
00043     assert( vec_tokens[0] == "NodeID"   &&
00044             vec_tokens[1] == "SCATS"    &&
00045             vec_tokens[2] == "SCATSID"  &&
00046             vec_tokens[4] == "Cycle"    &&
00047             vec_tokens[5] == "Offset"   );
00048 
00049     // Reading all signaled intersections
00050     while(getline(fin,line)){
00051       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00052       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00053       // Getting the intersection data
00054       string id = vec_tokens[0];      
00055       string isScats = vec_tokens[1];
00056       int scatsId = vec_tokens[2] != "" ? atoi(vec_tokens[2].c_str()) :  atoi(vec_tokens[0].c_str());
00057       int cycle =  atoi(vec_tokens[4].c_str());
00058       int offset =  atoi(vec_tokens[5].c_str());
00059       // Only Scats intersections!
00060       boost::algorithm::to_lower(isScats);
00061       assert(isScats == "true");
00062       // Adding it to the scenario
00063       sc->addIntersection(new Intersection(id, scatsId, cycle, offset));      
00064     }
00065 
00066     // I dont care about Non-signaled intersections
00067 
00068   }
00069 
00073   void ArtemisScenarioReader::readLinks(Scenario* sc){
00074     
00075     // File with the links between intersections
00076     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/Links.txt").c_str());
00077 
00078     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00079     string line;
00080     getline(fin,line);
00081     
00082     vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00083     
00084     assert( vec_tokens[0] == "From"     &&
00085             vec_tokens[1] == "To"       &&
00086             vec_tokens[2] == "Link"     &&
00087             vec_tokens[8] == "NumLanes" );
00088 
00089     // Reading all Links
00090     while(getline(fin,line)){
00091       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00092       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00093       // Getting Link Data
00094       string id = vec_tokens[2];
00095       Intersection* from = sc->getIntersection(vec_tokens[0]);
00096       Intersection* to = sc->getIntersection(vec_tokens[1]);
00097       int numLanes = atoi(vec_tokens[8].c_str());
00098       // Some verification
00099       // I dont care about links going to unsignaled intersections
00100       if(to == NULL) continue;
00101       // Adding the Link
00102       sc->addLink(new Link(id,from,to,numLanes));
00103     }
00104   }

00110   void ArtemisScenarioReader::readDetectors(Scenario* sc){
00111    
00112     // File with detectors description
00113     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/Detectors.txt").c_str());
00114 
00115     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00116     string line;
00117     getline(fin,line);
00118     
00119     vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00120     
00121     assert( vec_tokens[0] == "Link"     &&
00122             vec_tokens[1] == "IDnum"    &&
00123             vec_tokens[2] == "Lane"     );
00124 
00125     // Reading all detectors
00126     while(getline(fin,line)){
00127       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00128       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00129       // Getting detector data      
00130       assert(vec_tokens[0] != "" && vec_tokens[1] != "" && vec_tokens[2] != "" );
00131       Link* link = sc->getLink(vec_tokens[0]);
00132       int scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00133       int lane = atoi(vec_tokens[2].c_str());
00134       // Adding the detector to the link
00135       link->addDetector(new Detector(scatsId,lane));      
00136     }
00137 
00138   }

00144   void ArtemisScenarioReader::readPhases(Scenario* sc){
00145 
00146     // File with the signal phases
00147     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/Signal Phases.txt").c_str());
00148 
00149     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00150     string line;
00151     getline(fin,line);
00152     
00153     vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00154     
00155     assert( vec_tokens[0] == "NodeID"   &&
00156             vec_tokens[1] == "Phase"    );
00157 
00158     // Reading all Signal Phases
00159     while(getline(fin,line)){
00160       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00161       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00162       // Getting phase data
00163       assert(vec_tokens[0] != "" && vec_tokens[1] != "");
00164       int intersection_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[0].c_str());
00165       Intersection* i = sc->getIntersection(intersection_scatsId);     
00166       // Adding the signal group to the intersection
00167       i->addPhase(new Phase( vec_tokens[1]));      
00168     }
00169     
00170 
00171   }

00177   void ArtemisScenarioReader::readSignalGroups(Scenario* sc){
00178 
00179     // File with the signal groups
00180     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/Signal Groups.txt").c_str());
00181 
00182     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00183     string line;
00184     getline(fin,line);
00185     
00186     vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00187 
00188     if( vec_tokens[0] != "NodeID"       ||
00189         vec_tokens[1] != "Group"        ||
00190         vec_tokens[2] != "From"         ||
00191         vec_tokens[3] != "To"           ||
00192         vec_tokens[4] != "IsArrow"      ||
00193         vec_tokens[5] != "StartPhase"   ||
00194         vec_tokens[6] != "EndPhase"     ){
00195       cout << "Format for Signal Groups.txt is incorrect" << endl;
00196       exit(-1);
00197     }
00198 
00199     // Reading all Signal Groups
00200     while(getline(fin,line)){
00201       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00202       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00203       // Getting signal group data
00204       assert(vec_tokens[0] != "" && vec_tokens[1] != "" && vec_tokens[5] == vec_tokens[6] );      
00205       int intersection_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[0].c_str());
00206       int signal_group_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00207       Intersection* i = sc->getIntersection(intersection_scatsId);
00208       Phase* p = i->getPhase(vec_tokens[5]);
00209       if(p == NULL ){
00210         cout << "ERROR reading signal groups: Phase " << vec_tokens[5] << " not found" << endl;
00211         exit(-1);
00212       }
00213       // Adding the signal group to the intersection
00214       SignalGroup* sg = new SignalGroup(signal_group_scatsId);
00215       p->addSignalGroup(sg);
00216       Link* l = sc->getLink(vec_tokens[2] + "-" + i->getId() );
00217       if(l == NULL ){
00218         cout << "ERROR reading signal groups: Link " << ( vec_tokens[2] + "-" + i->getId() ) << " not found" << endl;
00219         exit(-1);
00220       }
00221       l->addSignalGroup(sg);
00222       // As the phase have the same signal group as the link, then the link detectors will be the phase detectors too.
00223       assignPhasesDetectors(p,l->detectors);
00224     }
00225     
00226 
00227   }
00228 
00232   void ArtemisScenarioReader::assignPhasesDetectors(Phase* p, DetectorSet detectors){
00233     for(DetectorSet::iterator di=detectors.begin(); di!= detectors.end(); di++)
00234       p->addDetector(*di);
00235   }

00244   vector<string> ArtemisScenarioReader::getTokenizedLine(string line){
00245     // Setting up tokenizer
00246     typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> >  tokenizer;
00247     boost::char_separator<char> sep("\t","", boost::keep_empty_tokens);
00248 
00249 
00250     tokenizer tokens(line, sep);
00251     vector <string> vec_tokens;
00252     for (tokenizer::iterator tok_iter = tokens.begin(); tok_iter != tokens.end(); ++tok_iter) vec_tokens.push_back(*tok_iter);
00253 
00254     return vec_tokens;
00255   }
